mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, east front at night
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Unknown
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white horizontal image of the Mansion's east front with balustrade at night, taken from the northeast lawn. Image is adhered to thicker material. Handwriting on front reads: 'Taken at 11:15 p.m. by aid of full moon and electric light on flag. Exposure 30 min - 6.3.' Handwriting on reverse reads: 'Note: 1. Double shadows on left end of mansion. 2. Light on cupola.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion exterior
